name: Meet The Wizard
original_description: You received a letter from the local wizard. He claims to have information regarding the old community center.

name: The Mysterious Qi
original_description: Within a secret lock-box, you found a note with peculiar instructions. It's signed by a 'Mr. Qi'.

name: The Mysterious Qi
original_description: You've found another note written by 'Mr. Qi'. The request is even more unusual this time.

name: The Mysterious Qi
original_description: You've found yet another strange note within the Mayor's fridge. This time, the instructions are more cryptic.

name: The Mysterious Qi
original_description: You found another note in the sand dragon's eye. It seems Mr. Qi's strange scavenger hunt has come to an end.

name: Getting Started
original_description: If you want to become a farmer, you have to start with the basics. Use your hoe to till the soil, then use a seed packet on the tilled soil to sow a crop. Water every day until the crop is ready for harvest.

name: Raising Animals
original_description: Robin, the local carpenter, lives north of town. In exchange for raw materials and money, she'll construct new buildings on your farm. You'll need her to build a coop or barn so that you can raise animals.

name: Advancement
original_description: As you gain experience, you'll discover new crafting recipes to increase profit and make life easier. A scarecrow, for example, will prevent crows from snacking on your precious crops.

name: Introductions
original_description: It would be a nice gesture to introduce yourself around town. Some people might be anxious to meet the new farmer.

name: Copper Ore
original_description: You found a piece of copper ore. You're not sure what you can use it for, but the local blacksmith ought to know.

name: Forging Ahead
original_description: If you're going to keep mining, you should build a furnace.

name: Smelting
original_description: Now that you've built a furnace, you can smelt some metal. According to Clint's instructions, if you place 5 copper ore and 1 piece of coal in the furnace, it should produce a copper bar.

name: To The Beach
original_description: Someone named Willy invited you to visit the beach south of town. He says he has something to give you.

name: Explore The Mine
original_description: There's an old mine shaft in the mountains north of town. There could be valuable minerals inside, but Marlon hinted that it might be dangerous.

name: Initiation
original_description: If you can slay 10 slimes, you'll have earned your place in the Adventurer's Guild.

name: Initiation
original_description: You sucessfully dispatched 10 slimes. Now you can enter the Adventurer's Guild.

name: Deeper In The Mine
original_description: It seems that the mine elevator is still functional. It will allow you to quickly return to any elevator doors you've discovered. A deeper expedition might be in order.

name: To The Bottom?
original_description: So far, there's no sign of the bottom. How low does it go?

name: The Skull Key
original_description: You found a strange looking key in the bottom of the mines.

name: Qi's Challenge
original_description: You've been challenged to reach level 25 in the skull cavern. You've been promised a substantial reward if you're successful.

name: Marnie's Request
original_description: Marnie came by the farm and asked if you'd bring her a cave carrot. She's trying to train her goats to speak, and cave carrot is their favorite snack.

name: Fish Casserole
original_description: Jodi swung by the farm to ask you to dinner at 7:00 PM. Her only request was that you bring a largemouth bass for her fish casserole.

name: Archaeology
original_description: You found an ancient-looking object. Could it be some kind of artifact from long ago? Perhaps Gunther, curator of the local museum, has the answer.

name: Archaeology
original_description: Gunther asked if you'd consider donating any new artifacts or minerals you find to the museum. He says he'll compensate you by way of occasional rare goods.

name: How To Win Friends
original_description: Giving gifts is a great way to build friendships. Learn each person's individual tastes and you'll be popular in no time.

name: "Rat Problem"
original_description: There's something odd going on in the Community Center...

name: Goblin Problem
original_description: There's a goblin blocking the path to the Witch's hut. There must be some way to get him to move... Perhaps I should seek out more information on Goblins.

name: Dark Talisman
original_description: The Wizard asked me to retrieve the magic ink from his ex-wife's house... but to gain access I'll need a dark talisman.

name: Strange Note
original_description: You found a note, barely legible, asking you to bring "may-pal serrup" to the "seecrit wuds".

name: Cryptic Note
original_description: You found a note that reads, "Someone is waiting for you on level 100 in the Skull Cavern"

name: A Winter Mystery
original_description: You encountered a suspicious looking figure by the bus stop. When it saw you, it fled toward town. Could there be a clue to its whereabouts?

name: Robin's Lost Axe
original_description: Robin lost her favorite axe. The last time she remembers using it, she was cutting wood south of Marnie's ranch.

name: Jodi's Request
original_description: Jodi needs a fresh cauliflower for a recipe she's making. She's asking you to bring her one.

name: Mayor's "Shorts"
original_description: Mayor Lewis has lost his purple "shorts". He's asking you to find and return them... Discreetly.

name: Pam Is Thirsty
original_description: Pam is hankerin' for a pale ale. Regular old beer won't do. You can brew one yourself if you have hops and a keg.

name: Crop Research
original_description: Demetrius needs a fresh melon for his research.

name: Knee Therapy
original_description: George needs a hot pepper to soothe his aching knee.

name: Cow's Delight
original_description: Marnie wants to give her cows a special treat. She's asking for a single bunch of amaranth.

name: Blackberry Basket
original_description: It's blackberry season, but Linus can't find his basket! He's asking you to help him find it. He has no idea where it is.

name: Carving Pumpkins
original_description: Caroline wants to carve a pumpkin with her daughter. She asked you to bring her one from the farm.

name: Catch A Squid
original_description: Willy is challenging you to catch a squid. He says you can fish them from the ocean on winter nights.

name: Clint's Attempt
original_description: Clint wants you to give Emily an amethyst. He wants you to tell her it's from him.

name: A Dark Reagent
original_description: The wizard wants you to descend into the mines and fetch him a Void Essence. He needs it for some kind of dark magic.

name: A Favor For Clint
original_description: Clint got a new hammer and he wants to test it out on a variety of metals.

name: Robin's Request
original_description: Robin wrote to you asking for some hardwood.

name: Fish Stew
original_description: Gus wants to make fish stew, but he needs an albacore.

name: Fresh Fruit
original_description: Emily wants a taste of spring. She's asking for a fresh apricot.

name: Granny's Gift
original_description: Evelyn wants to surprise her husband with a gift.

name: Pierre's Notice
original_description: Pierre will pay "top coin" to whoever brings him a plate of sashimi. Apparently he's really craving the stuff.

name: Aquatic Research
original_description: Demetrius is studying the toxin levels of the local pufferfish. He'd like you to bring him one.

name: A Soldier's Star
original_description: Kent wants to give his wife a starfruit for their anniversary.

name: Mayor's Need
original_description: Mayor Lewis wants truffle oil. He won't explain what it's for. Maybe it's none of your business.

name: Wanted: Lobster
original_description: Gus put out a notice requesting a fresh lobster.

name: Pam Needs Juice
original_description: Pam's TV Remote is dead. She's having a tough time going back and forth between the couch and the TV dial.

name: Staff Of Power
original_description: The Wizard is creating a staff of phenomenal power. Who knows what it's for. He needs an iridium bar to finish it.

name: Catch a Lingcod
original_description: Willy is challenging you to catch a Lingcod.

name: Exotic Spirits
original_description: Gus wants to make a Coco-no-no, but he's missing the main ingredient.

name: Errand for your Wife
original_description: Your wife asked you to bring her 200 pieces of fiber for a secret project.

name: Haley's Cake-Walk
original_description: Your wife is organizing a charity cake-walk in the town square. She asked you to bring a chocolate cake.
